name: Scaffolding fun
description:
This is a fun survey to scaffold a new project.
It will ask you a few questions and then generate a new project for you.

questions.title: What is the name of your project?
questions.description: This will be used in multiple places, so make sure it's a good name.

questions.title: Where do you want the files?
questions.description:
This is the directory where the files will be generated.
It should be a relative path from the current directory.

questions.title: What architectures do you want to support?
questions.description:
This will generate a project that supports multiple architectures.
You can choose one or more of the following options.

questions.title: Do you want to sprinkle some secrete sause on top?
questions.description: This will add some extra files to your project.

confirm.title: Summary
confirm.description: Above is a summary of your choices. Was this what you had in mind?
